revised_title: A Study of Egg Development and Generative Organs in Myriapods and Arachnida
tldr: The author examines the generative organs and egg development in Myriapods and Arachnida, focusing on the differences between these groups and their reproductive processes. They describe the formation of the egg, the role of the Purkinjean vesicle, and the unique characteristics of the ovary in these species.
